Package fun.connor.lighter.autoconfig

Runtime API for compile-time generated automatic configuration.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ResolverFactory
    A functional interface for a simple factory to create LighterRequestResolver instances.
    ReverseInjector
    The reverse injector allows injection frameworks which cannot produce an InjectorObjectFactory to inject into Lighter directly.
    RouteConfiguration
    Simple factory for providing preconfigured LighterRouter instances.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AutoConfigFactory
    Singleton Factory for loading compile-time generated auto configuration objects.
    LighterRouter
    Maintains mappings between routes and application endpoint handlers.
    Route
    Single mapping between an HTTP method, URI, and a request resolver.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AutoConfigException
    Runtime exception thrown in the case of any unrecoverable error while attempting to load auto configuration objects.

Package fun.connor.lighter.autoconfig Description

Runtime API for compile-time generated automatic configuration. This includes router and dependency configuration classes. Notably, the interfaces defined in this API do not depend on lighter-compiler's specific implementation. This allows application developers to write their own configuration objects if there are special requirements.
For example, the APIs in this package can be used to hand-write endpoint handler wiring or manual dependency management.
